summary:
Add Vampire Follower to the game inspired by Snow elf Dawnguard DLC
Level Up With Player From Level 20
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Georgia][size=3][size=5][b]Snow Heart Vampire Follower[/b] HDT

[/size]Add Vampire Follower to the game inspired by Snow elf Dawnguard DLC
Level Up With Player From Level 20

Name: Snow Heart

Body: -CBBE HDT-

Class: Mage Sword

Level: 20[b]

Location:[/b]

Whiterun Hall of the Dead

[b]Required :[/b]
Skyrim.esm
Update.esm
Dawnguard.esm

[b][u]> > Required for HDT< <[/u][/b]

Skyrim Script Extender (SKSE)
http://skse.silverlock.org/

XP32 Maximum Skeleton -XPMS by [b]xp32[/b]
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26800

HDT Physics Extensions by [b]HydrogensaysHDT[/b]
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53996

[b]Recommended : [/b]

The LOOT
http://loot.github.io/

UFO - Ultimate Follower Overhaul by [b]Original - fLokii -- Recent updates - Vamyan[/b]
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/14037

Follower Commentary Overhaul - FCO by [b]terzaerian[/b]
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52019

DVA Dynamic Vampire Appearance by [b]Aipex8 and TaikoDragon[/b]
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/41634

[b]Small Note :[/b]
Im not going to take any request of changing the appearance. [u]Only[/u] to the error for the file.
for the load order i highly recommended The LOOT on Recomended list
if it still not working or cause your game to crash i suggested to remove the file.

[b]Installation : [/b]

NMM or copy to data folder

[b]Uninstall : [/b]

Remove from NMM or Delete from data folder

[b]Credit : [/b]

BETHESDA

Caliente's Beautiful Bodies Edition -CBBE- by [b]Caliente[/b]
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666

BodySlide 2 and Outfit Studio by [b]Caliente[/b]
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49015

Mature skin texture and body for UNP CBBE ADEC by Maevan2
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/32986

KS Hairdos - 400 by [b]Kalilies Shocky and Stealthic Khaos[/b]
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58221

Remodeled Armor for CBBE Bodyslide HDT by [b]ChronoTrigger77[/b]
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25259

[b]Please leave a comment
"Thank you for download"[/b][/size][/font][/center]
author: Fachry
